about.title: Traditional Ayurvedic Healing in Modern Times
about.description1: At Shri Vishwa Nakshatra Ayurvedic Clinic & Panchakarma Centre, we bring the ancient science of Ayurveda to address modern health challenges. Under the expert guidance of
about.description2: , we offer authentic treatments rooted in traditional knowledge.
about.specializations: Our specializations include Panchakarma therapies, Nadi Pariksha (pulse diagnosis), Suvarna Prashan Sanskar for children, and personalized Ayurvedic diet and lifestyle planning.

meta.title: Ayurvedic Services & Panchakarma Treatments | Shri Vishwa Nakshatra Clinic
meta.description: Explore our comprehensive Ayurvedic services including Panchakarma (Basti, Vamana, Virechana, Nasya, Raktamokshana), Nadi Pariksha, Suvarna Prashan, and personalized herbal treatments in Hyderabad.

hero.subtitle: Our Services
hero.title: Comprehensive Ayurvedic Treatments
hero.description: Discover our range of authentic Ayurvedic therapies designed to restore balance, detoxify your body, and promote natural healing through time-tested methods.

panchakarma.subtitle: Detoxification & Rejuvenation
panchakarma.title: Panchakarma Therapies
panchakarma.description: The five sacred cleansing procedures that form the foundation of Ayurvedic healing.

basti.title: Basti (Enema Therapy)
basti.description: Medicated enema for detoxification and treating Vata disorders, joint pain, and digestive issues.

vamana.title: Vamana (Emesis Therapy)
vamana.description: Therapeutic vomiting to eliminate excess Kapha dosha from the body.

virechana.title: Virechana (Purgation)
virechana.description: Controlled purgation to cleanse the digestive system and remove Pitta toxins.

nasya.title: Nasya (Nasal Therapy)
nasya.description: Administration of medicated oils through the nose for head and neck ailments.

raktamokshana.title: Raktamokshana
raktamokshana.description: Blood purification therapy for skin diseases and blood-related disorders.

specialized.subtitle: Specialized Care
specialized.title: Additional Services
specialized.description: Beyond Panchakarma, we offer specialized diagnostic and treatment services.

nadi.title: Nadi Pariksha
nadi.description: Ancient pulse diagnosis to understand your body constitution (Prakriti) and current imbalances (Vikriti).

suvarna.title: Suvarna Prashan Sanskar
suvarna.description: Gold-based immune boosting therapy for children to enhance immunity, memory, and overall development.

diet.title: Ayurvedic Diet Planning
diet.description: Personalized diet and lifestyle recommendations based on your dosha type for optimal health.

herbal.title: Herbal Treatments
herbal.description: Custom herbal formulations and natural remedies prepared from authentic Ayurvedic herbs.

conditions.subtitle: We Can Help
conditions.title: Conditions We Treat
conditions.description: Our Ayurvedic treatments address a wide range of health conditions naturally.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Healing Journey?
cta.description: Book a consultation to receive personalized treatment recommendations based on your unique health needs.
